summary: IT student focused on web development, UI/UX, and building practical projects with modern JS.

star_items.title: Personal Portfolio Modernization
star_items.situation: Static portfolio lacked responsiveness and clear structure.
star_items.task: Redesign and implement a responsive, accessible portfolio site.
star_items.action: Used semantic HTML, Tailwind, and componentized sections. Implemented dark mode and mobile nav.
star_items.result: Load time improved ~35%, mobile Lighthouse 95+, clearer information architecture.

star_items.title: Chatbot Proof of Concept

star_items.title: Responsive UI Exercises
